  • weekly picks (Feb 3 week 2022)
  • A WordCloud of 2022 Feb 3rd week collection

    1. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.076801 Quantized Nonlinear Conductance in Ballistic Metals (CKane, PRL) memorandum https://physics.aps.org/articles/v15/s19 A Quantized Surprise from Fermi Surface Topology (Physics)

    2. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.070401 Emergent Kardar-Parisi-Zhang Phase in Quadratically Driven Condensates (PRL)

    3. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.075901 Magnetic Control of Soft Chiral Phonons in PbTe (chiral phonon, PRL)

    4. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.078301 Outbreak Size Distribution in Stochastic Epidemic Models (PRL)

    5. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.078302 Subdiffusive Activity Spreading in the Diffusive Epidemic Process (PRL)

    6. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075132 Quantum phases of two-dimensional ${\mathbb{Z}}_{2}$ gauge theory coupled to single-component fermion matter (PRB)

    7. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.064422 Large Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction and atomic layer thickness dependence in a ferromagnet-${\mathrm{WS}}_{2}$ heterostructure (PRB)

    8. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085126 Kondo cloud in a one-dimensional nanowire (Kondo, PRB)

    9. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085413 Nanopatterning of rotating highly oriented pyrolytic graphite (0001) surfaces by ion beam irradiation: Experiments and modeling (irridation, PRB)

    10. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085414 Crosstalk analysis for simultaneously driven two-qubit gates in spin qubit arrays (QD, PRB)

    11. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L060102 Phase transitions of zirconia: Machine-learned force fields beyond density functional theory (ML-DFT, PRB)

    12. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L060406 Role of electronic excitation on the anomalous magnetism of elemental copper (PRB)

    13. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.07640v1 Suppression of fluctuations in a two-band superconductor with a quasi-1D band (Superconductivity, arxiv.org)

    14. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.07619v1 The Case of Itinerant Magnetism in CaMn${2}$Al${10}$: Self-Consistent Renormalisation (SCR) Theory Study (arxiv.org)

    15. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.07357v1 Thermodynamics of the spin-half square-kagome lattice antiferromagnet (arxiv.org)

    16. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.07224v1 Evidence for a spinon Kondo effect in cobalt atoms on single-layer 1T-TaSe$_2$ (PALee, arxiv.org) memorandum

    17. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.07647v1 Can a spin chain relate combinatorics to number theory? (arxiv.org)

    18. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06993v1 A skyrmion fluid and bimeron glass emerging from competition with a chiral spin liquid (skyrmion, arxiv.org)

    19. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevX.12.011030 Topological Superconductivity in an Extended $s$-Wave Superconductor and Its Implication to Iron-Based Superconductors (JPHu, PRX)

    20. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.054510 Thermodynamic properties of nodal superconductors close to a magnetic quantum critical point (cuprate, PRB)

    21. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.054308 Detection of edge states by high-order harmonic generation in the Harper model (PRB)

    22. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.054413 Multimagnon dynamics and thermalization in the $S=1$ easy-axis ferromagnetic chain (PRB)

    23. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.054512 Coupled Hubbard ladders at weak coupling: Pairing and spin excitations (PRB)

    24. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.064420 Frustrated magnetism of spin-$\frac{1}{2}$ Heisenberg diamond and octahedral chains as a statistical mechanical monomer-dimer problem (PRB)

    25. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085123 Phononic real Chern insulator with protected corner modes in graphynes (phonon, PRB)

    26. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L060405 Instabilities of spin-1 Kitaev spin liquid phase in presence of single-ion anisotropies (PRB)

    27. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.064303 Lattice dynamics with molecular Berry curvature: Chiral optical phonons (QNiu, PRB)

    28. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075125 Separation of Kondo lattice coherence from crystal electric field in ${\mathrm{CeIn}}_{3}$ with Nd substitutions (Ce, PRB)

    29. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075304 Monolayer ${\mathrm{CeI}}_{2}$: An intrinsic room-temperature ferrovalley semiconductor (Ce, PRB)

    30. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085412 Experimental evidence for dissipationless transport of the chiral edge state of the high-field Chern insulator in ${\mathrm{MnBi}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}{4}$ nanodevices (MnBi2Te4, PRB)

    31. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L060404 Uniaxial pressure effects in the two-dimensional van der Waals ferromagnet ${\mathrm{CrI}}_{3}$ (CrI3, PRB)

    32. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L081301 Floquet vortex states induced by light carrying an orbital angular momentum (Floquet, PRB)

    33. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06244 Pressure-induced superconductivity reentrant in transition metal dichalcogenide TiSe2 (TiSe2, arXiv.org)

    34. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05850 Fragmented Cooper pair condensation in striped superconductors (fragmented Cooper pair, arXiv.org)

    35. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06528 Photoinduced 120-degree spin order in the Kondo-lattice model on a triangular lattice (Kondo lattice, arXiv.org)

    36. http://arxiv.org/abs/2202.06184 Breakdown of bulk-projected isotropy in surface electronic states of topological Kondo insulator SmB$_6$(001) (SmB6, arXiv.org)

    37. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevX.12.011029 Observation of a Novel Lattice Instability in Ultrafast Photoexcited SnSe (lattice instability, PRX)

    38. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075306 Dynamic Friedel oscillations on the surface of a topological insulator (Friedel, PRB)

    39. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.075414 Theoretical realization of two-dimensional half-metallicity and fully spin-polarized multiple nodal-line fermions in monolayer PrOBr (PRB)

    40. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.085121 Charge dynamics in magnetically disordered Mott insulators (PRB)

    41. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L081107 Experimental realization of topological corner states in long-range-coupled electrical circuits (PRB)

    42. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L081408 Strain-tuning of domain walls in multilayer graphene probed in the quantum Hall regime (PRB)

    43. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05588v1 Large family candidates for kagome topological superconductors (kagome, arxiv.org)

    44. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05561v1 Spin-triplet superconductivity in Weyl nodal-line semimetals (arxiv.org)

    45. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05663v1 Valley-Polarized State Induced $\varphi_0$-Josephson Junction in Twisted Bilayer Graphene (arxiv.org)

    46. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05660v1 Spin stiffness, spectral weight, and Landau damping of magnons in metallic spiral magnets (arxiv.org)

    47. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05368v1 Uniaxial stress effect on the quasi-one-dimensional Kondo lattice CeCo$_2$Ga$_8$ (1D Ce, arxiv.org)

    48. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05379v1 Theory of perturbatively nonlinear quantum transport I: general formulation and structure of the retarded correlator (AManchon, arxiv.org)

    49. https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.05378v1 Theory of perturbatively nonlinear quantum transport II: Hilbert space truncation, gauge invariance, and second order transport in a spatially uniform, time-varying electric field (AManchon, arxiv.org)
